title: Classé XXX
resume: This series between the scenes of an unknown world, taboo and "wild" than the porn. Hosted by Mélanie Maynard, the series focuses on actors, actresses, directors and producers who gravitate around the middle of the pornographic film, and practicing a profession, needless to say, unusual. Who are these men and women who make their living with sex? What relationship do they have with their spouses, children and their families? They manage to live their "art"? Without following the protagonists on film sets, the series reveals the personal challenges these people necessarily caused by the marginality of their job ... rated "XXX"!
